bibl.title: with a note by John TAIT, An Inscribed Pedestal from the Temple of Tutu.
Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons
bibl.author: BAGNALL, Roger S.

bibl.note: Pedestal discovered in two pieces (block 1D/8, found in 1993, and block I.87, found in 1992) in the forecourt of the Temple of Tutu (Ismant el-Kharab). Sandstone, h. 65 cm. - The Greek Text (R.S.B. and Kl.A.W.). Reign of Nero. - The Demotic Text (J.T.). Late Ptolemaic or even second century BCE.
BAGNALL Roger S. and Klaas A. WORP, with a note by John TAIT, An Inscribed Pedestal from the Temple of Tutu.

Colin A. HOPE and Gillian E. BOWEN (Edd.), Dakhleh Oasis Project: Preliminary Reports on the 1994-1995 to 1998-1999 Field Seasons = Dakhleh Oasis Project: Monograph No. 11 (Oxford - Oakville, Connecticut, 2002) pp. 49-51, 2 figg.
